class.name: TCPServer
class.description: A TCP server. Listens to connections on a port and returns a [StreamPeerTCP] when it gets an incoming connection.

method.name: get_local_port
method.description: Returns the local port this server is listening to.

method.name: is_connection_available
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a connection is available for taking.

method.name: is_listening
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the server is currently listening for connections.

method.name: listen
method.description: Listen on the [code]port[/code] binding to [code]bind_address[/code]. If [code]bind_address[/code] is set as [code]"*"[/code] (default), the server will listen on all available addresses (both IPv4 and IPv6). If [code]bind_address[/code] is set as [code]"0.0.0.0"[/code] (for IPv4) or [code]"::"[/code] (for IPv6), the server will listen on all available addresses matching that IP type. If [code]bind_address[/code] is set to any valid address (e.g. [code]"192.168.1.101"[/code], [code]"::1"[/code], etc), the server will only listen on the interface with that addresses (or fail if no interface with the given address exists).

method.name: take_connection
method.description: If a connection is available, returns a StreamPeerTCP with the connection.
